description: This file contains CSS styles for a simple todo application, managing themes, layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and dynamic background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled for flex display and centered content.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes.
